alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Showers producing strong winds will impact portions of southern Grant and southern Blackford Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing strong winds near Swayzee, or 11 miles west of Fairmount, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion around 830 PM EDT. Gas City, Fairmount and Jonesboro around 835 PM EDT. Upland around 840 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Matthews and Hartford City. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 252 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
